headline: How Investors Are Reacting To CSX (CSX) Early Network Upgrades And Efficiency Push
summary: In recent days, CSX has reported improved network performance, including its fastest train velocity since early 2021 and the early completion of the Howard Street Tunnel and Blue Ridge subdivision projects, which together are expected to enhance capacity and resilience across its rail network. At the same time, CSX has closed its 84-year-old corporate aviation department and continued to earn recognition for corporate responsibility, underscoring a sharper focus on operational efficiency...
